info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 19 at 5:37PM CDT until May 19 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Norman OK
info.description:
FFWOUN
The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Southwestern Coal County in southeastern Oklahoma... Johnston County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Marshall County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Carter County in southern Oklahoma... Southeastern Murray County in southern Oklahoma...
* Until 830 PM CDT.
* At 537 PM CDT, emergency management reported flash flooding in Tishomingo. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Emergency management reported.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Ardmore, Tishomingo, Dickson, Mannsville, Springer, Ravia, Wapanucka, Mill Creek, Bromide, Gene Autry, Russett, Reagan, Connerville, Pontotoc, Lake Murray, Overbrook and Clarita.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 8:30 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 8:30 PM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Carter, OK; Coal, OK; Johnston, OK; Marshall, OK; Murray, OK

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 8:30 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 8:30 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Carter, OK; Coal, OK; Johnston, OK; Marshall, OK; Murray, OK
